item.title: Bangalore to Mysore Solo Trip plan
item.description: Two days Ride from Bangalore to Mysore, If you are a Couple riding on Bike or You are riding with a Friend in two different Bikes, then this plan for two days works very well. Below is the route mentioned where you can plan accordingly, if at all you need to spend some more time in some place in the list, you can skip the next place in the planned route. Route Bangalore -> Chamundeshwari
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
